2410.08920.title: Efficient Hyperparameter Importance Assessment for CNNs
2410.08920.paper_summary:
Hyperparameter selection is an essential aspect of the machine learning
pipeline, profoundly impacting models' robustness, stability, and
generalization capabilities. Given the complex hyperparameter spaces associated
with Neural Networks and the constraints of computational resources and time,
optimizing all hyperparameters becomes impractical. In this context, leveraging
hyperparameter importance assessment (HIA) can provide valuable guidance by
narrowing down the search space. This enables machine learning practitioners to
focus their optimization efforts on the hyperparameters with the most
significant impact on model performance while conserving time and resources.
This paper aims to quantify the importance weights of some hyperparameters in
Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) with an algorithm called N-RReliefF,
laying the groundwork for applying HIA methodologies in the Deep Learning
field. We conduct an extensive study by training over ten thousand CNN models
across ten popular image classification datasets, thereby acquiring a
comprehensive dataset containing hyperparameter configuration instances and
their corresponding performance metrics. It is demonstrated that among the
investigated hyperparameters, the top five important hyperparameters of the CNN
model are the number of convolutional layers, learning rate, dropout rate,
optimizer and epoch.
2410.08920.paper_summary_zh: 超參數選擇是機器學習管道中至關重要的方面，它深刻地影響著模型的健壯性、穩定性和泛化能力。鑑於與神經網路相關的複雜超參數空間以及計算資源和時間的約束，優化所有超參數變得不切實際。在此背景下，利用超參數重要性評估 (HIA) 可以通過縮小搜索空間來提供有價值的指導。這使機器學習從業者能夠將其優化工作重點放在對模型效能影響最顯著的超參數上，同時節省時間和資源。本文旨在使用稱為 N-RReliefF 的演算法量化卷積神經網路 (CNN) 中一些超參數的重要性權重，為在深度學習領域應用 HIA 方法奠定基礎。我們通過在十個流行的影像分類資料集上訓練超過一萬個 CNN 模型來進行廣泛的研究，從而獲得包含超參數配置實例及其對應效能指標的綜合資料集。結果表明，在所研究的超參數中，CNN 模型最重要的前五個超參數是卷積層數、學習率、中斷率、最佳化器和輪次。
